timeline.bodyText: We do not need to explicitly add @Nonnull annotation, it's always added via @ElementsAreNonnullByDefault.
timeline.author: idelpivnitskiy
idelpivnitskiy

timeline.bodyText: The value of compression is always gzip. Consider removing it.
timeline.author: idelpivnitskiy

timeline.bodyText: Why did you add o? It's unused.
timeline.author: idelpivnitskiy

timeline.bodyText: While you are here, please remove throws Exception, it's never thrown from this test.
timeline.author: idelpivnitskiy

timeline.bodyText:
The serviceTalkCodingFor method returns identity() when compresion == null. Can we return null in this case and use ScalarCallMetadata.INSTANCE later? It will verify a case when compression is not specified, similar to client.scalarCall(request) (without meta-data param).
Same for the streaming variant, we can use ClientStreamingCallMetadata.INSTANCE.
timeline.author: idelpivnitskiy
idelpivnitskiy
idelpivnitskiy

timeline.bodyText: Why is this always null here?
timeline.author: idelpivnitskiy
